tool_description: The Game Reviews API provides access to a comprehensive collection of video game reviews from reputable sources.
name: GameReviews
title: GameReviews

api_list.name: Get Individual Games Reviews Source
api_list.description: This endpoint provides detailed information about an individual game review source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gamereviews.p.rapidapi.com/games/destructoid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gamereviews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gamereviews.p.rapidapi.com/games/{reviewid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gamereviews.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Games Reviews
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve a comprehensive list of game reviews from various reputable sources.
